channel.title: Few #563 fields

item.title: Few #563 fields
item.dc:creator: @D_e_n_v_e_r D e n v e r
item.description:
@D_e_n_v_e_r wrote:

//Interfaces-Related - Class : rg
int InterfaceID - > rg.Ib
int InterfaceChildren - > rg.S
int InterfaceComponentIndex - > rg.uc
int InterfaceWidth - > rg.ub
int InterfaceHeight - > rg.H

//Character Related 
int[] WalkX - > jj.Ac
int[] WalkY - > jj.oc
int PosX - > cp.y
int PosY - > cp.t

//BufferPointer
int BufferPointer -> eb.H

//Player-Related:
static Player[] PlayerList -> qk.a
static int[] PlayerIndexes -> hh.S
static int PlayerCount -> vn.g

//Npc-Related
static Npc[] NpcList -> kr.e
static int[] NpcIndexes -> bi.x
static int NpcCount -> vr.a

//Nodes - Class : mh
long NodeID -> mh.e
Lmh; PrevNode -> mh.k
Lmh; NextNode -> mh.g
////////////////Client Fields///////////////////
static player myplayer -> hr.e
static int BaseX - > lo.o
static int BaseY - > ke.Yc
static int Plane() -> sj.v //floor lvl
static int GameState -> pj.b // login index

//Minimap-Related
static Float minimapOffSet -> to.m
static int minimapangle -> rs.h
static int MinimapScale -> ud.x

//Curves
//could be calculated manually,but fields are more accurate
static int[] SineCurve -> pe.D
static int[] CosineCurve -> pe.C

//3D Ground Arrays
Byte[][][] static GroundData - > lp.k
GroundArray[][][] static GroundArray - > il.S

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////

32 fields , No more for you, pray for me
